dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly express emotions, wearing their heart on their sleeve.
Your FarTwin will keep emotions to themselves, rarely showing vulnerability.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will aggressively assert their position and fight for what they believe in.
Your FarTwin will avoid conflict and seek compromise, prioritizing harmony over confrontation.

dimensions.label: Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will base decisions on logic and reason, weighing all available options.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings rather than analysis.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new challenges and take calculated risks to push their limits.
Your FarTwin will prefer safety and stability, avoiding risks whenever possible.

dimensions.label: Social Preferences
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and sociable, enjoying the company of large groups.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more intimate settings, recharging in solitude.

dimensions.label: Adaptability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin adapt to change?

options.description: Your FarTwin will easily adjust to new situations and roll with the punches.
Your FarTwin will struggle with change, preferring routine and stability.

dimensions.label: Responsibility
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle responsibilities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take initiative and be proactive about completing tasks.
Your FarTwin will wait for others to assign or initiate tasks, preferring not to take the lead.
